song.title: Take My Life
song.lyrics:
[1] .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my life and let it be consecrated, Lord, for Thee .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my moments and my days, let them flow in ceaseless praise || .C2 G/B Em Asus A Take my hands and let them move at the impulse of Thy love .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my feet and let them be swift and beautiful for Thee
[C] . Em G Asus7 A7 Here am I all of me . Em G Asus7 A7 Take my life it's all for thee
[2] .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my voice and let me sing always, only for my King .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my lips and let them be filled with messages from Thee || .C2 G/B Em Asus D Take my silver and my gold, not a mite would I withhold .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my intellect and use every power as You choose
[3] .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my will and make it thine, it shall be no longer mine .D Asus Bm7 G /F# /Em A D Take my heart it is thine own, it shall be thy royal throne || .C2 G/B Em A D Take my love my Lord I pour at Your feet it's treasure store .D Asus Bm7 G/F# /Em A D Take myself and I will be ever, only all for thee
